summary:
Coding in progress....


International Experience:
- Rourkela, India (Feb 2016 - May 2016)
- Rizhao, China (Jun 2016 - Aug 2016)
- Krakow, Poland (Oct 2016 - Jan 2017)
- Osmaniye, Turkey (Mar 2017 - Sep 2017)
-  IJmuiden, Netherlands (Oct 2017 - May 2018)
- Tianjin, China (May 2018 - Nov 2018)
- Hamburg, Germany (Jan 2019 - May 2019)
- Padua, Italy (Sep 2019 - Feb 2020)

Innovations:
- "Irrigation System" - Atmel, Bascom-AVR
     • iENA 2010, Nuremberg - Germany: Bronze medal
     • ARCA 2010, Zagreb - Croatia: Silver medal
     • In show 2010, Kastav - Croatia: Silver medal
     • Inova mladi 2010, Zagreb - Croatia: Gold medal
     • Inventum 2010, Ilok - Croatia: Gold medal

Skills:
- C# (WinForms, WPF, Console, Services, MVVM)
- ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework, MVC
- Azure (SQL DB, Web App, Storage)
- Telerik Reports / Crystal Reports
- Xamarin Forms (Android, iOS)
- MS-SQL / Oracle DB / SQLite
- Unit Testing (NUnit, MSTest)
- Windows Server
- Virtualization
- TFS / GitHub
- OOP / OOD
- Postman
- Arduino
- XAML
- JSON
- XML

Interests:
- Volunteer Work
     • Croatian Red Cross (Apr 2019 - May 2020) - Blood Donor
     • IC Pythagoras (Jul 2009 - May 2018)
- Scuba Diving (Master Scuba Diver)
- Animal Care (#Vegetarian)
- Programming
- Electronics
- Traveling
- Running
- Arduino
- CNC
- Beer
